collection.name: 1.76 MHz
collection.openText: This is a record of the day that we must never forget.

specialTipSize.specialTip: The more highly Fortitude level employees, the lower the success rate for $ 0 work. It is considered that the main reason is that the violence has increased rapidly due to the excessive influence of $0.
When the work result was normal, $0's Qliphoth counter has decreased with a normal probability.
When the work result was bad, $0's Qliphoth counter has decreased with a high probability.
When employee #0 panics during work, $0‘s Qliphoth counter will be reduced.
When the work result is Good or better, $0‘s Qliphoth counter will increase. When producing all E-Box as positive, Qliphoth counter will be raised by 2 levels.

The surveillance camera detected various noises coming from around the facility. Based on the fact that it happened after $0‘s Qliphoth counter reached 0, it is assumed that the noise originated from $0‘s Containment Unit.
The number of sections with noise steadily increases until the Abnormality’s Qliphoth counter has recovered.
